sentences.en: Invention is momentous and fundamental to people what the soul is vital and significant to us.
sentences.cn: 发明对人来说是重要且根本的，正如灵魂对我们来说是重要的。

sentences.en: These same cycles of change had momentous impacts on the sparse human populations of the region.
sentences.cn: 这些相同的变化周期对该区域稀少的人口产生了重大影响。

sentences.en: In that year, two momentous discoveries were made.
sentences.cn: 那年有2项重大的新发现。
